TEXT.TITLE: NUMAC OIL <NMC> HAS 59.7 MLN DLR FINANCING
TEXT.BODY: Numac Oil and Gas Ltd said it arranged a 59.7 mln dlr financing with two investment dealers. The financing includes 30 mln dlrs of convertible subordinated debentures and 2.7 mln common shares at a price of 11 dlrs per share for a total of 59.7 mln dlrs Wood Gundy Inc and Gordon Capital Corp agreed to buy the securities. The debentures will be for a term of 15 years with a seven pct coupon and convertible into common shares for 10 years at 13.50 dlrs per share. The debentures are not redeemable for three years, Numac said. Reuter
